description.full: ofEventArgs is the base class for ofKeyEventArgs, ofMouseEventArgs, ofAudioEventArgs and ofResizeEventArgs classes. Also used as parameter for events that doesn't send any argument like draw or update, as Poco events don't allow void functions.

##InlineDescription

##Description

ofEventArgs is the base class for ofKeyEventArgs, ofMouseEventArgs, ofAudioEventArgs and ofResizeEventArgs classes. Also used as parameter for events that doesn't send any argument like draw or update, as Poco events don't allow void functions.

##InlineDescription






##Description

ofEventArgs is the base class for ofKeyEventArgs, ofMouseEventArgs, ofAudioEventArgs and ofResizeEventArgs classes. Also used as parameter for events that doesn't send any argument like draw or update, as Poco events don't allow void functions.
